akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment The Attorney General shall establish such financial institutions fraud task forces as the Attorney General deems appropriate to ensure that adequate resources are made available to investigate and prosecute crimes in or against financial institutions and to recover the proceeds of unlawful activities from persons who have committed fraud or have engaged in other criminal activity in or against the financial services industry.
(b) Supervision The Attorney General shall determine how each task force shall be supervised and may provide for the supervision of any task force by the Special Counsel.
